title: Fall Of Assad Breaks Key Link In Iran's "Axis Of Resistance"
content: The fall of Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad shattered the key link in Iran's "axis of resistance", but Tehran will look for ways to adapt to the new reality, analysts say.
summary: The fall of Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad shattered the key link in Iran's "axis of resistance", but Tehran will look for ways to adapt to the new reality, analysts say.

title: In Unique Contest, China Woman Wins $1,400 For Ditching Phone For 8 Hours
content: The challenge was designed to highlight the growing dependence on technology and encourage people to embrace mindfulness and digital detox practices.
summary: The challenge was designed to highlight the growing dependence on technology and encourage people to embrace mindfulness and digital detox practices.

title: In Pics: Looking Back At 2024 - Remembering Those Who Left Us
content: As we bid farewell to 2024 and recount the glories of the season, we remember there were tears too.
summary: As we bid farewell to 2024 and recount the glories of the season, we remember there were tears too.

title: "I Voted For People": South Korean MP Defies Party To Impeach President
content: As South Korean lawmakers tried to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol for declaring martial law, ruling party MPs marched out of the chamber to thwart the effort -- except for Ahn Cheol-soo.
summary: As South Korean lawmakers tried to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol for declaring martial law, ruling party MPs marched out of the chamber to thwart the effort -- except for Ahn Cheol-soo.

title: Israel Struck "Chemical Weapons" In Syria, Says Foreign Minister
content: Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Saar said Monday that his country had struck "chemical weapons" in neighbouring Syria, where rebel forces ousted president Bashar al-Assad over the weekend.
summary: Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Saar said Monday that his country had struck "chemical weapons" in neighbouring Syria, where rebel forces ousted president Bashar al-Assad over the weekend.

title: Opinion: France To Germany To Belgium, EU Is Imploding
content: The greatest threat to the EU doesn't come from Moscow or Beijing, but from within. Populist and nationalist movements are on the rise, fuelled by a toxic blend of economic anxiety, cultural insecurity, and distrust of Brussels.
summary: The greatest threat to the EU doesn't come from Moscow or Beijing, but from within. Populist and nationalist movements are on the rise, fuelled by a toxic blend of economic anxiety, cultural insecurity, and distrust of Brussels.

title: Mysterious Car-Sized Drones Spotted Over New Jersey, FBI Begins Probe
content: These sightings, which began in late November, involve large, often car-sized drones flying in coordinated patterns.
summary: These sightings, which began in late November, involve large, often car-sized drones flying in coordinated patterns.

title: Tesla, Google, Amazon: How Much They Are Spending For Their CEOs' Safety
content: The murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson has cast a spotlight on the extensive security measures employed by Wall Street's elite to ensure their safety.
summary: The murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson has cast a spotlight on the extensive security measures employed by Wall Street's elite to ensure their safety.

title: Syria Fallout Because Of "Huge Miscalculation By Iran": Israeli Envoy
content: Israel today said that it is not involved in the conflict in Syria, nor does it want to involve itself, but Tel Aviv is preparing to defend itself against any attack that may come from the Syrian side, Israel's envoy to India Reuven Azar said.
summary: Israel today said that it is not involved in the conflict in Syria, nor does it want to involve itself, but Tel Aviv is preparing to defend itself against any attack that may come from the Syrian side, Israel's envoy to India Reuven Azar said.

title: Indian Navy Inducts Russia-Made Guided Missile Frigate INS Tushil
content: Indian Navy's Russian-manufactured guided missile frigate INS Tushil was commissioned into the force at Russia's coastal city of Kaliningrad on Monday.
summary: Indian Navy's Russian-manufactured guided missile frigate INS Tushil was commissioned into the force at Russia's coastal city of Kaliningrad on Monday.

title: Timeline: 10-Day Blitzkrieg Campaign That Ended Assad's Rule In Syria
content: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad fled the country with his family and took asylum in Russia after rebels took control of the country in a 10-day blitzkrieg, seizing the capital Damascus and toppling the government.
summary: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad fled the country with his family and took asylum in Russia after rebels took control of the country in a 10-day blitzkrieg, seizing the capital Damascus and toppling the government.

title: Refugee Crisis, Kurdistan Question: What's Turkey's "New Reality" In Syria
content: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's regime collapsed in just 13 days of rebel offensive after 24 years of rule, leaving a political vacuum in its capital Damascus.
summary: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's regime collapsed in just 13 days of rebel offensive after 24 years of rule, leaving a political vacuum in its capital Damascus.

title: Trump Envoy's Big Warning To Hamas Over Hostage Situation In Gaza
content: Donald Trump's Middle East envoy warned on Monday during a visit to the region it would "not be a pretty day" if the hostages held in Gaza were not released before the U.S. President-elect's inauguration.
summary: Donald Trump's Middle East envoy warned on Monday during a visit to the region it would "not be a pretty day" if the hostages held in Gaza were not released before the U.S. President-elect's inauguration.

title: Russia To Discuss Military Bases With Syria's New Rulers, Says Kremlin
content: The Kremlin said on Monday that it was too early to say what the future would hold for Russia's military bases in Syria, adding that it would be the subject of discussion with the new rulers in Damascus.
summary: The Kremlin said on Monday that it was too early to say what the future would hold for Russia's military bases in Syria, adding that it would be the subject of discussion with the new rulers in Damascus.

title: Taiwan Military On High Alert As China Warships Sail Near Island
content: Taiwan's military was on high alert Monday after detecting Chinese warships near the island, Taipei said, as it prepared for likely drills by Beijing in response to President Lai Ching-te's US visits.
summary: Taiwan's military was on high alert Monday after detecting Chinese warships near the island, Taipei said, as it prepared for likely drills by Beijing in response to President Lai Ching-te's US visits.

title: Drug Party Busted, 120 People In Their Underwear Detained In Thailand
content: Police in Thailand detained more than 120 people found in their underwear at a drug-fuelled party in Bangkok, officers told AFP Monday.
summary: Police in Thailand detained more than 120 people found in their underwear at a drug-fuelled party in Bangkok, officers told AFP Monday.

title: "War Can't Be Finished...": Zelensky On Trump's Call For Immediate Ceasefire
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has reportedly rejected his incoming US counterpart Donald Trump's call for an immediate ceasefire, saying Kyiv would not accept any peace agreement without security guarantees.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has reportedly rejected his incoming US counterpart Donald Trump's call for an immediate ceasefire, saying Kyiv would not accept any peace agreement without security guarantees.

title: "Attacks On Religious Places Regrettable": India's Plainspeak With Dhaka
content: Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said today that he conveyed New Delhi's concerns to Dhaka over the attacks on minorities in Bangladesh.
summary: Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said today that he conveyed New Delhi's concerns to Dhaka over the attacks on minorities in Bangladesh.

title: "Got Nothing To Tell You": Kremlin On Assad's Whereabouts
content: The Kremlin on Monday declined to confirm reports that toppled Syrian president Bashar al-Assad has fled to Moscow, adding that it was "surprised" by the rebel takeover.
summary: The Kremlin on Monday declined to confirm reports that toppled Syrian president Bashar al-Assad has fled to Moscow, adding that it was "surprised" by the rebel takeover.

title: Passenger Attempts To Hijack Mexican Flight And Divert It To US, Arrested
content: The pilot quickly responded by diverting the plane to Guadalajara, where the Mexican National Guard arrested the suspect.
summary: The pilot quickly responded by diverting the plane to Guadalajara, where the Mexican National Guard arrested the suspect.
